tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Itinerary (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timing TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE ItineraryTimings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
CREATE TABLE SightseeingLocations (sightseeing_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(255), address VARCHAR(255), opening_hours VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE ItineraryDetails (itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY, itinerary_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE ItinerarySightseeingMap (map_id INT PRIMARY KEY, itinerary_id INT, sightseeing_id INT);
CREATE TABLE SightseeingTimings (timing_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sightseeing_id INT, time_schedule TIMESTAMP);
